content.title: Overview of Data Structures and Algorithms
content.description: Introduction to the basics of data structures and algorithms, and their significance in programming.

content.title: Importance of Data Structures and Algorithms in JavaScript
content.description: Discussion on the role and importance of data structures and algorithms in JavaScript programming.

content.title: Big O Notation and Complexity Analysis
content.description: Explanation of Big O Notation and how to analyze the complexity of algorithms.

content.title: Arrays
content.description: Introduction to arrays, their basic operations, dynamic arrays, and multidimensional arrays.

content.title: Linked Lists
content.description: Understanding different types of linked lists including singly, doubly, and circular linked lists.

content.title: Stacks
content.description: Implementation of stacks and their applications in various algorithms.

content.title: Queues
content.description: Implementation of queues, circular queues, deque, and priority queues.

content.title: Hash Tables
content.description: Understanding hash functions, collision handling, and implementation of hash tables.

content.title: Trees
content.description: Introduction to various tree structures including binary trees, binary search trees, AVL trees, red-black trees, B-trees, and segment trees.

content.title: Heaps
content.description: Exploration of binary heaps, min heap, max heap, and heap operations including heap sort.

content.title: Graphs
content.description: Understanding graph representations, traversal algorithms, shortest path algorithms, and minimum spanning trees.

content.title: Sorting Algorithms
content.description: Detailed exploration of various sorting algorithms including bubble sort, selection sort, insertion sort, merge sort, quick sort, heap sort, and radix sort.

content.title: Searching Algorithms
content.description: Introduction to different searching algorithms such as linear search, binary search, and interpolation search.

content.title: String Algorithms
content.description: String matching algorithms, including Knuth-Morris-Pratt, Rabin-Karp, and data structures like tries and suffix trees/arrays.

content.title: Introduction to Dynamic Programming
content.description: Explanation of dynamic programming concepts including memoization and tabulation, along with common dynamic programming problems.

content.title: Greedy Algorithms
content.description: Understanding greedy algorithms and their applications, with examples such as activity selection and Huffman coding.

content.title: Backtracking
content.description: Exploration of backtracking algorithms, including the N-Queens problem and Sudoku solver.

content.title: Divide and Conquer
content.description: Introduction to divide and conquer algorithms, including quick sort, merge sort, and the closest pair of points problem.

content.title: Bit Manipulation
content.description: Overview of bitwise operations and common bit manipulation techniques.

content.title: Computational Geometry
content.description: Study of computational geometry topics like convex hull and line intersection.

content.title: Network Flow Algorithms
content.description: Study of network flow algorithms including the Ford-Fulkerson and Edmonds-Karp algorithms.

content.title: Graph Coloring
content.description: Introduction to graph coloring techniques.

content.title: Travelling Salesman Problem (TSP)
content.description: Discussion on the Travelling Salesman Problem and various approaches to solve it.

content.title: Approximation Algorithms
content.description: Overview of approximation algorithms used for solving NP-hard problems.

content.title: Coding Practice Platforms
content.description: Introduction to coding practice platforms such as LeetCode, HackerRank, and CodeSignal.

content.title: Common Interview Questions
content.description: A collection of common interview questions related to data structures and algorithms.

content.title: Problem-Solving Techniques
content.description: Strategies and techniques for effective problem-solving in coding interviews.

content.title: Summary of Key Concepts
content.description: Recap of the key concepts covered in the course.

content.title: Next Steps in Learning Advanced Topics
content.description: Guidance on what to learn next after mastering the basics of data structures and algorithms.

content.title: Resources for Further Learning
content.description: A list of resources including books, online courses, and tutorials for further learning.
